code: import{createSelector}from"reselect";var selectPostDetailReducer=function selectPostDetailReducer(state){return state.postDetailReducer;};export var selectPostDetail=createSelector(selectPostDetailReducer,function(state){return state.postDetail;});export var selectPosts=createSelector(selectPostDetailReducer,function(state){return state.posts;});export var selectIsLoading=createSelector(selectPostDetailReducer,function(state){return state.isLoading;});export var selectError=createSelector(selectPostDetailReducer,function(state){return state.error;});
